Posts.Content: Does anybody have greasy skin on there faces, if so what do you use? sending hugs
Posts.Title: Greasy skin

Posts.Content: Good morning to everyone one the chemo train, had to take a indigestion tablet this morning, I had my pillow propped up last night but then woke up with a stiff neck so I took one of the pillows away, then when that woke up to take my steroid tablet that is when I had to have my gaviscon,other than that just lying in bed with my son while he watches you tube, hope you all have a great Sunday, tomorrow I have got to have a full body scan, 12pm radioactive injection first then back up again for 3pm for scan. sending hugs to everyone
Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: Hi mandz1001, Hope all goes well for you on Tuesday, I had double mastectomy on 22nd may I have got to have chemotherapy on 19th July then when that is all finished radiotherapy, mine was grade 2 had all my lymph nodes under my left arm taken away and 3 from under my right arm the tumour was 40mm, mine was strongly oestrogen and progesterone receptor positive and HER2 receptor negative, you are not alone, hope you still get your holiday  Sending you hugs
Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: Hi start my first chemo on 19th July, just hope it goes ok, good luck to everyone this month.
Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: Hi where do you get the travel bands from and do they work, start my first chemo on 19th July. Feeling a bit nervous?
Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: Hi Ali i am drinking lots of Ribena black currant,how are you feeling other wise, I had a fuzzy head and dry mouth yesterday but that seems to have passed(fingers crossed)which area are off the country are you in? sending hugs x
Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: Was this your first session of chemo? Mines 19th July?
Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: Hi chemo club,Had my 1st chemo treatment yesterday, don't feel to bad today,had a hot flush after I got back from a walk, checked my temperature and is was 36.3, but it was warmer in than out,got my next one on 9th august, then next Thursday and the following one I have got,to have my Hickman line flushed out at my local health centre and also the stitches taken out. Hope you are all feeling very positive and drink plenty is what everybody keeps telling me. sending
Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: The advice I was given was not to dr google thinks it will make you worse, listen to the experts who know what are the right advice is, you must tell someone in your family, and not do it on your own you need support and stay positive and not negative. sending you hugs and extra kisses xxx
Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: Hi mandz1001, That’s great to hear you can go on your special birthday holiday. Supermom

Posts.Content: Hi there when I joined I set up a password, then clicked on the category I wanted to find then just posted a message. hope that helps.

Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: Hi hope you are on the mend,I have heartburn and indigestion, plus a white tongue, and today I have got to have a full body scan,when I rang the number they gave me for the ward which I rang on Saturday to ask for advice they where helpful, they even rang me back yesterday to see how I was, and told me to pop up today and perhaps they could give me something else. sending hugs

Posts.Content: hi is there a link to the July breast cancer chemo club Many thanks  Supermom
Posts.Title: Link

Posts.Content: Hi granny59, before I was diagnosed with breast cancer, I went to the doctors about my periods,she was sending me for a vaginal scan, but unfortunately I had to cancel that because it was the same time has my breast surgery, i have spoken to my breast nurse and she said to rebook it and to let my oncologist know when I see him and also tell the nurse when I have my chemo chat, it will not interfere with my chemo at all, my periods have been weird for the last two years, my oncologist says I am premenopausal, but I have been told chemo brings on the menopause.

Posts.Content: Hi has anybody had a funny period since breast surgery, mine is not like a proper one it is bloody gunk? My last proper period was being of March?

Posts.Content: Hi I am using nystan oral which was given to me before by the hospital and last time by my doctor yes having white blood injections from last Friday till this Friday, having to do them myself?
